page.title: 12OUTDOOR SPORTS IN GRANTOWN
page.content:
Grantown-on-Spey has many outdoor sporting facilities. Just outside the block lies the river Spey, world famous as a salmon river. It also has a good reputation for trout which have been more abundant in recent years. Permits for use of the local association waters are available locally and private beats may be rented, at a price!.
Grantown also boasts a fine eighteen hole golf course (par 70, 5745yds). It also has excellent clubhouse and meals facilities. Close to the Golf Club we also have a bowling green and Tennis Club with eight courts. Racquets and balls may be hired. All these facilities welcome visitors. The town also has two amateur football teams, Grantown and United. More recently a BMX track has been bulit.
